definition: of or relating to or characteristic of Japan or its people or their culture or language, the Japanese language
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of Japan or its people or their culture or language
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of Japan or its people or their culture or language
= synonyms: Nipponese
noun
- the Japanese language
= example: the Japanese language
- collectively, the people of Japan or Japanese descent
= example: collectively, the people of Japan or Japanese descent
